Package de.seggebaeing.sqlanalyzer.logic.promptable.impl.llm

Class AbstractLLMHandler

java.lang.Object
de.seggebaeing.sqlanalyzer.logic.promptable.impl.llm.AbstractLLMHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
Promptable
Direct Known Subclasses:
ClaudePromptHandler, DeepSeekPromptHandler, GeminiPromptHandler, OpenAIPromptHandler
public abstract class AbstractLLMHandler extends Object implements Promptable
Abstract base class for all LLM (Large Language Model) handler implementations.

Provides shared infrastructure for concrete Promptable implementations:

  • A reusable HttpClient for communicating with external APIs.
  • A Gson instance for JSON serialization and deserialization.
  • A static Logger for consistent logging across subclasses.

By implementing Promptable, this class enforces the contract that all subclasses must provide their own de.seggebaeing.sqlanalyzer.logic for handling prompts and returning responses from the underlying LLM.
